questions.question: What does a yellow diamond-shaped traffic sign indicate?
questions.explanation: Yellow diamond-shaped signs are used to warn drivers about upcoming hazards or changes in road conditions.

questions.question: What does a red octagon-shaped traffic sign mean?
questions.explanation: Red octagon-shaped traffic signs indicate that drivers must come to a complete stop.

questions.question: What should you do when you see a flashing yellow traffic signal?
questions.explanation: A flashing yellow signal indicates that you should slow down and proceed with caution.

questions.question: Which of the following has the right-of-way at an intersection?
options: The vehicle that is moving fastest
questions.explanation: At an intersection where there is no traffic control device, the vehicle on the right has the right-of-way.

questions.question: When is it legal to exceed the posted speed limit in South Dakota?
questions.explanation: It is never legal to exceed the posted speed limit in South Dakota.

questions.question: In South Dakota, what is the general speed limit on rural interstate highways?
questions.explanation: The general speed limit on rural interstate highways in South Dakota is 75 mph.

questions.question: Where is it illegal to park in South Dakota?
questions.explanation: It is illegal to park on a bridge in South Dakota.

questions.question: What should you do when driving in fog in South Dakota?
questions.explanation: When driving in fog, you should use your low beam headlights to improve visibility.

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle starts to skid on a wet road?
options: Steer in the direction of the skid
Steer in the opposite direction of the skid
questions.correctAnswer: Steer in the direction of the skid
questions.explanation: If your vehicle starts to skid, you should steer in the direction of the skid to regain control.

questions.question: What should you do if your vehicle's headlights fail while driving at night?
options: Continue to drive at the same speed
Pull over and turn on your hazard lights
Increase your speed to get to your destination faster
Turn off your vehicle and wait for help
questions.correctAnswer: Pull over and turn on your hazard lights
questions.explanation: If your headlights fail while driving at night, you should immediately pull over and turn on your hazard lights.
